AT.name: MIGHTY GUNVOLT BURST
AT.description: Rather than make a direct sequel to their bite-sized 2D action game Mighty Gunvolt from 2014, Inti Creates has made the next installment in the Mighty Gunvolt series a brand new full-sized game that features characters from multiple universes with Gunvolt (Azure Striker Gunvolt) and Beck (Mighty No. 9) taking the stage once again, but in a much deeper and more expansive world that differs greatly from the original in many ways. The game systems have been completely revamped and powered up with lots of new additions, including a deep character customization system that lets you mold and shape your character into the ultimate hero that works best for you! But that's not all! The new Burst Combo system rewards you for finishing off enemies and bosses up close and personal. The classic pixel style graphics have also been completely redone to blur the line between 8-bit and 16-bit and take you back to the golden age of 2D action games!

AU.name: MIGHTY GUNVOLT BURST
AU.description: Rather than make a direct sequel to their bite-sized 2D action game Mighty Gunvolt from 2014, Inti Creates has made the next installment in the Mighty Gunvolt series a brand new full-sized game that features characters from multiple universes with Gunvolt (Azure Striker Gunvolt) and Beck (Mighty No. 9) taking the stage once again, but in a much deeper and more expansive world that differs greatly from the original in many ways. The classic pixel style graphics have also been completely redone to blur the line between 8-bit and 16-bit and take you back to the golden age of 2D action games!

BE.name: MIGHTY GUNVOLT BURST
BE.description: Au lieu de produire une suite directe au petit jeu d'action 2D Mighty Gunvolt 2014, Inti Creates a créé un jeu de taille complet de la série Mighty Gunvolt qui comprend des personnages de différents univers avec Gunvolt (Azure Striker Gunvolt) et Beck (Mighty No. 9) de retour dans la mêlée, un monde plus large et plus profond qui diffère grandement de l'original. Les systèmes de jeu ont été entièrement rénovées et comprennent de nouvelles actions, telles qu'un système de personnalisation qui vous permet de façonner votre personnage un héros pour vous ! Et ce n'est pas tout ! Le nouveau système de Burst Combo vous récompense pour mettre fin à des ennemis et boss à proximité. Le style visuel a été amélioré pour offrir un mélange de 8-bit et 16-bit qui vous amène à l'âge d'or des jeux d'action en 2D !

ES.name: MIGHTY GUNVOLT BURST
ES.description: En vez de producir una secuela directa al pequeño juego de acción 2D Mighty Gunvolt de 2014, Inti Creates creó un juego de tamaño completo de la serie Mighty Gunvolt que incluye personajes de varios universos con Gunvolt (Azure Striker Gunvolt) y Beck (Mighty No. 9) de vuelta al ataque, en un mundo más vasto y profundo que difiere mucho del original. ¡Los sistemas de juego han sido completamente renovados e incluyen varias adiciones, tales como un sistema de personalización que te permite moldear a tu personaje en un héroe que mejor combina contigo! ¡Y eso no es todo! El nuevo sistema Burst Combo te recompensa por acabar con enemigos y jefes cerca. ¡El estilo visual también se ha mejorado para ofrecer una mezcla de 8 bits y 16 bits que te llevará a la era dorada de los juegos de acción 2D!

PT.name: MIGHTY GUNVOLT BURST
PT.description: Em vez de produzir uma sequela directa ao pequeno jogo de ação 2D Mighty Gunvolt de 2014, Inti Creates criou um jogo de tamanho completo da série Mighty Gunvolt que inclui personagens de vários universos com Gunvolt (Azure Striker Gunvolt) e Beck (Mighty No. 9) de volta ao ataque, num mundo mais vasto e profundo que difere em muito do original. Os sistemas de jogo foram completamente renovados e incluem várias adições, tais como um sistema de personalização que te permite moldar o teu personagem num herói que melhor combina contigo! E isso não é tudo! O novo sistema Burst Combo recompensa-te por acabar com inimigos e bosses ao perto. Os estilo visual também foi melhorado para oferecer uma mistura de 8-bit e 16-bit que te levará à era dourada dos jogos de ação 2D!
